title:
Can you use prisoners of Jail and state to do the work on that eye sore site between Lelan and the Cape Fear Bridge?



Also, Why not cut out some of that Fraudulent Welfare money that is doled out each month to help pay for cleaning up this outrageous mess and cutting grass, etc?
